text: There was no difference in OS or RFS at three years between treatment groups.It should be noted that adverse events and morbidity were not reported.The fourth identified RCT1212 found no difference in the risk of death, disease progression or severe late complications between women who received standard brachytherapy versus radical hysterectomy after both groups had received identical external beam chemoradiotherapy.
